fields.name: updateDataset
fields.description: Update the metadata about a particular Dataset

fields.name: updateDatasets
fields.description: Update the metadata about a batch of Datasets

fields.name: updateChart
fields.description: Update the metadata about a particular Chart

fields.name: updateDashboard
fields.description: Update the metadata about a particular Dashboard

fields.name: updateNotebook
fields.description: Update the metadata about a particular Notebook

fields.name: updateDataFlow
fields.description: Update the metadata about a particular Data Flow (Pipeline)

fields.name: updateDataJob
fields.description: Update the metadata about a particular Data Job (Task)

fields.name: createTag
fields.description:
Create a new tag. Requires the 'Manage Tags' or 'Create Tags' Platform Privilege. If a Tag with the provided ID already exists,
it will be overwritten.

fields.name: updateTag
fields.description: Update the information about a particular Entity Tag

fields.name: deleteTag
fields.description: Delete a Tag

fields.name: setTagColor
fields.description: Set the hex color associated with an existing Tag

fields.name: createPolicy
fields.description: Create a policy and returns the resulting urn

fields.name: updatePolicy
fields.description: Update an existing policy and returns the resulting urn

fields.name: deletePolicy
fields.description: Remove an existing policy and returns the policy urn

fields.name: addTag
fields.description: Add a tag to a particular Entity or subresource

fields.name: addTags
fields.description: Add multiple tags to a particular Entity or subresource

fields.name: batchAddTags
fields.description: Add tags to multiple Entities or subresources

fields.name: removeTag
fields.description: Remove a tag from a particular Entity or subresource

fields.name: batchRemoveTags
fields.description: Remove tags from multiple Entities or subresource

fields.name: addTerm
fields.description: Add a glossary term to a particular Entity or subresource

fields.name: batchAddTerms
fields.description: Add glossary terms to multiple Entities or subresource

fields.name: addTerms
fields.description: Add multiple glossary terms to a particular Entity or subresource

fields.name: removeTerm
fields.description: Remove a glossary term from a particular Entity or subresource

fields.name: batchRemoveTerms
fields.description: Remove glossary terms from multiple Entities or subresource

fields.name: addOwner
fields.description: Add an owner to a particular Entity

fields.name: batchAddOwners
fields.description: Add owners to multiple Entities

fields.name: addOwners
fields.description: Add multiple owners to a particular Entity

fields.name: removeOwner
fields.description: Remove an owner from a particular Entity

fields.name: batchRemoveOwners
fields.description: Remove owners from multiple Entities

fields.name: addLink
fields.description: Add a link, or institutional memory, from a particular Entity

fields.name: updateLink
fields.description: Update a link, or institutional memory, from a particular Entity

fields.name: removeLink
fields.description: Remove a link, or institutional memory, from a particular Entity

fields.name: updateDescription
fields.description: Incubating. Updates the description of a resource. Currently only supports Dataset Schema Fields, Containers

fields.name: removeUser
fields.description: Remove a user. Requires Manage Users & Groups Platform Privilege

fields.name: updateUserStatus
fields.description: Change the status of a user. Requires Manage Users & Groups Platform Privilege

fields.name: removeGroup
fields.description: Remove a group. Requires Manage Users & Groups Platform Privilege

fields.name: addGroupMembers
fields.description: Add members to a group

fields.name: removeGroupMembers
fields.description: Remove members from a group

fields.name: createGroup
fields.description: Create a new group. Returns the urn of the newly created group. Requires the Manage Users & Groups Platform Privilege

fields.name: createDomain
fields.description:
Create a new Domain. Returns the urn of the newly created Domain. Requires the 'Create Domains' or 'Manage Domains' Platform Privilege. If a Domain with the provided ID already exists,
it will be overwritten.

fields.name: moveDomain
fields.description: Moves a domain to be parented under another domain.

fields.name: deleteDomain
fields.description: Delete a Domain

fields.name: setDomain
fields.description: Sets the Domain for a Dataset, Chart, Dashboard, Data Flow (Pipeline), or Data Job (Task). Returns true if the Domain was successfully added, or already exists. Requires the Edit Domains privilege for the Entity.

fields.name: batchSetDomain
fields.description: Set domain for multiple Entities

fields.name: unsetDomain
fields.description: Sets the Domain for a Dataset, Chart, Dashboard, Data Flow (Pipeline), or Data Job (Task). Returns true if the Domain was successfully removed, or was already removed. Requires the Edit Domains privilege for an asset.

fields.name: createERModelRelationship
fields.description: Create a ERModelRelationship

fields.name: updateERModelRelationship
fields.description: Update a ERModelRelationship

fields.name: deleteERModelRelationship
fields.description: Delete a ERModelRelationship

fields.name: updateDeprecation
fields.description: Sets the Deprecation status for a Metadata Entity. Requires the Edit Deprecation status privilege for an entity.

fields.name: batchUpdateDeprecation
fields.description: Updates the deprecation status for a batch of assets.

fields.name: updateCorpUserProperties
fields.description: Update a particular Corp User's editable properties

fields.name: updateCorpGroupProperties
fields.description: Update a particular Corp Group's editable properties

fields.name: deleteAssertion
fields.description: Remove an assertion associated with an entity. Requires the 'Edit Assertions' privilege on the entity.

fields.name: reportOperation
fields.description: Report a new operation for an asset

fields.name: createGlossaryTerm
fields.description: Create a new GlossaryTerm. Returns the urn of the newly created GlossaryTerm. If a term with the provided ID already exists, it will be overwritten.

fields.name: createGlossaryNode
fields.description: Create a new GlossaryNode. Returns the urn of the newly created GlossaryNode. If a node with the provided ID already exists, it will be overwritten.

fields.name: updateParentNode
fields.description: Updates the parent node of a resource. Currently only GlossaryNodes and GlossaryTerms have parentNodes.

fields.name: deleteGlossaryEntity
fields.description: Remove a glossary entity (GlossaryTerm or GlossaryNode). Return boolean whether it was successful or not.

fields.name: updateName
fields.description: Updates the name of the entity.

fields.name: addRelatedTerms
fields.description: Add multiple related Terms to a Glossary Term to establish relationships

fields.name: removeRelatedTerms
fields.description: Remove multiple related Terms for a Glossary Term

fields.name: createNativeUserResetToken
fields.description: Generates a token that can be shared with existing native users to reset their credentials.

fields.name: batchUpdateSoftDeleted
fields.description: Updates the soft deleted status for a batch of assets

fields.name: updateCorpUserViewsSettings
fields.description: Update the View-related settings for a user.

fields.name: updateUserHomePageSettings
fields.description: Update the HomePage-related settings for a user.

fields.name: updateUserSetting
fields.description: Update a user setting

fields.name: batchAssignRole
fields.description: Batch assign roles to users

fields.name: acceptRole
fields.description: Accept role using invite token

fields.name: createInviteToken
fields.description: Create invite token

fields.name: createPost
fields.description: Create a post

fields.name: updatePost
fields.description: Update or edit a post

fields.name: deletePost
fields.description: Delete a post

fields.name: createView
fields.description: Create a new DataHub View (Saved Filter)

fields.name: updateView
fields.description: Delete a DataHub View (Saved Filter)

fields.name: deleteView
fields.description: Delete a DataHub View (Saved Filter)

fields.name: updateLineage
fields.description: Update lineage for an entity

fields.name: updateEmbed
fields.description: Update the Embed information for a Dataset, Dashboard, or Chart.

fields.name: createQuery
fields.description: Create a new Query

fields.name: updateQuery
fields.description: Update an existing Query

fields.name: deleteQuery
fields.description: Delete a Query by urn. This requires the 'Edit Queries' Metadata Privilege.

fields.name: createDataProduct
fields.description: Create a new Data Product

fields.name: updateDataProduct
fields.description: Update a Data Product

fields.name: deleteDataProduct
fields.description: Delete a DataProduct by urn.

fields.name: batchSetDataProduct
fields.description: Batch set or unset a DataProduct to a list of entities

fields.name: createApplication
fields.description: Create a new Application

fields.name: updateApplication
fields.description: Update a Application

fields.name: deleteApplication
fields.description: Delete a Application by urn.

fields.name: batchSetApplication
fields.description: Batch set or unset a Application to a list of entities

fields.name: createOwnershipType
fields.description: Create a Custom Ownership Type. This requires the 'Manage Ownership Types' Metadata Privilege.

fields.name: updateOwnershipType
fields.description: Update an existing Query. This requires the 'Manage Ownership Types' Metadata Privilege.

fields.name: deleteOwnershipType
fields.description: Delete a Custom Ownership Type by urn. This requires the 'Manage Ownership Types' Metadata Privilege.

fields.name: submitFormPrompt
fields.description:
Submit a response to a prompt from a form collecting metadata on different entities.
Provide the urn of the entity you're submitting a form response as well as the required input.

fields.name: batchAssignForm
fields.description:
Assign a form to different entities. This will be a patch by adding this form to the list
of forms on an entity.

fields.name: createDynamicFormAssignment
fields.description:
Creates a filter for a form to apply it to certain entities. Entities that match this filter will have
a given form applied to them.
This feature is ONLY supported in DataHub Cloud.

fields.name: verifyForm
fields.description:
Verifies a form on an entity when all of the required questions on the form are complete and the form
is of type VERIFICATION.

fields.name: createBusinessAttribute
fields.description: Create Business Attribute Api

fields.name: deleteBusinessAttribute
fields.description: Delete a Business Attribute by urn.

fields.name: updateBusinessAttribute
fields.description: Update Business Attribute

fields.name: addBusinessAttribute
fields.description: Add Business Attribute

fields.name: removeBusinessAttribute
fields.description: Remove Business Attribute

fields.name: updateDisplayProperties
fields.description: Update a particular entity's display properties

fields.name: updateGlobalViewsSettings
fields.description:
Update the global settings related to the Views feature.
Requires the 'Manage Global Views' Platform Privilege.

fields.name: updateDocPropagationSettings
fields.description: Update the doc propagation settings.

fields.name: updateApplicationsSettings
fields.description: Update the applications settings.

fields.name: createAccessToken
fields.description: Generates an access token for DataHub APIs for a particular user & of a particular type

fields.name: revokeAccessToken
fields.description: Revokes access tokens.

fields.name: createSecret
fields.description: Create a new Secret

fields.name: updateSecret
fields.description: Update a Secret

fields.name: deleteSecret
fields.description: Delete a Secret

fields.name: createIngestionSource
fields.description: Create a new ingestion source

fields.name: updateIngestionSource
fields.description: Update an existing ingestion source

fields.name: deleteIngestionSource
fields.description: Delete an existing ingestion source

fields.name: createIngestionExecutionRequest
fields.description:
Create a request to execute an ingestion job
input: Input required for creating an ingestion execution request

fields.name: cancelIngestionExecutionRequest
fields.description: Cancel a running execution request, provided the urn of the original execution request

fields.name: createTestConnectionRequest
fields.description:
Create a request to execute a test ingestion connection job
input: Input required for creating a test connection request

fields.name: rollbackIngestion
fields.description: Rollback a specific ingestion execution run based on its runId

fields.name: createTest
fields.description: Create a new test

fields.name: updateTest
fields.description: Update an existing test

fields.name: deleteTest
fields.description: Delete an existing test - note that this will NOT delete dangling pointers until the next execution of the test.

fields.name: batchUpdateStepStates
fields.description: Batch update the state for a set of steps.

fields.name: upsertStructuredProperties
fields.description: Upsert structured properties onto a given asset

fields.name: removeStructuredProperties
fields.description: Upsert structured properties onto a given asset

fields.name: createStructuredProperty
fields.description: Create a new structured property

fields.name: updateStructuredProperty
fields.description: Update an existing structured property

fields.name: deleteStructuredProperty
fields.description: Delete an existing structured property

fields.name: batchRemoveForm
fields.description: Remove a form from a given list of entities.

fields.name: createForm
fields.description: Create a new form based on the input

fields.name: deleteForm
fields.description: Delete a given form

fields.name: updateForm
fields.description: Update an existing form based on the input

fields.name: setLogicalParent
fields.description: Set or unset an entity's logical parent

fields.name: upsertConnection
fields.description:
Upsert a particular connection.
This requires the 'Manage Connections' platform privilege.

fields.name: upsertCustomAssertion
fields.description: Upsert a Custom Assertion

fields.name: reportAssertionResult
fields.description: Report result for an assertion

fields.name: raiseIncident
fields.description: Create a new incident for a resource (asset)

fields.name: updateIncidentStatus
fields.description: Update the status of an existing incident for a resource (asset)

fields.name: updateIncident
fields.description: Update an existing data incident. Any fields that are omitted will simply not be updated.

fields.name: upsertDataContract
fields.description: Create or update a data contract for a given dataset. Requires the "Edit Data Contract" privilege for the provided dataset.

fields.name: linkAssetVersion
fields.description: Link the latest versioned entity to a Version Set

fields.name: unlinkAssetVersion
fields.description: Unlink a versioned entity from a Version Set

fields.name: upsertPageTemplate
fields.description: Batch update the state for a set of steps.

fields.name: deletePageTemplate
fields.description: Delete a DataHub page template

fields.name: upsertPageModule
fields.description: Create or update a DataHub page module

fields.name: deletePageModule
fields.description: Delete a DataHub page module

fields.name: updateAssetSettings
fields.description: Update an asset's settings
